description:
Crocodile`s unexpected assistance creates an opening for Luffy to advance, and Whitebeard has a surprise lurking beneath the ice that might swing the momentum in favor of the pirates!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La phase finale ! Barbe Blanche veut retourner la situation
Moving into the Final Phase! Whitebeard`s Trump Card for Recovery!
Saishuu Kyokumen Totsunyuu! Shirohige Kishikaisei no Itte
Приближение финальной фазы! Поворотный ход Белоуса!
الانتقال للمرحلة الأخيرة! خطّة اللّحية البيضاء لقلب الموازين!
最終局面突入! 白ひげ起死回生の一手
